channel.title: Xbox360 controllers won't sync...?
channel.description:
The controllers won't sync.. I've tried everything. I'm not a complete dumbass, either. I've synced 'em before, and now they've decided to stop working.
The fuck?
That plug and play cable won't work either.

item.title: Xbox360 controllers won't sync...?
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

Problem was solved whilst I was moderated.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox360 controllers won't sync...?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

uh, what do you mean sync? Do you mean that they don’t connect up with the Xbox? (Wireless) If so, just press the little button beside the battery pack and the small button on the console, just keep pressing those buttons until the controller hooks up?

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox360 controllers won't sync...?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

make sure you push the sync button on the 360 and on your controller

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox360 controllers won't sync...?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

From what I can find online, it’s a problem with your hdd. Remove it from the xbox and put it back in, and tell me if that works.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox360 controllers won't sync...?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Get new battery packs. They damage easy.

Alphaspida:

PS3’s don’t phail. At least mine hasn’t. (2 years)

That’s also not related to anything on this topic. Also I spilt the tiniest bit of water on my PS3 controller and it completely short out.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox360 controllers won't sync...?
item.dc:creator: @Tomkruz Tomkruz
item.description:
@Tomkruz wrote:

What do you mean won’t sync? Do you mean to connect the controller to the console? Press the middle button on the controller, then you will see a white button (if pro or arcade) on the console. Then just press that one too, and it will sync. Or get new bateraies newb

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox360 controllers won't sync...?
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

That happened to my comp the other day i needed to restore my comp back 24 hours…

So, idk maybe screw battery out of bottom and put back in or something…

Read full topic
